column3: Hi! I’m Christopher. I usually clean the great hero statue when it was still standing,
but now I work as a police officer. The great hero is really a great guy
and all of us miss him so much.
If I were able to find him, then I would immediately tell you guys but for now,
Yeah! By the way, be careful with the treasure hunters that were roaming around.
They usually hurt people just to get the fragment.
Yeah! Thanks for the concern. Have a great day!
